name: Rocking Clamp
description: The Rocking Clamp is a woodworking tool designed to hold workpieces securely in place during gluing or assembly. It features a unique rocking motion that allows the jaws to apply even pressure and adjust to various thicknesses, making it suitable for clamping wide panels or irregular shapes. Its ergonomic design also enables easy one-handed operation, enhancing efficiency in woodworking projects.
